meaning list.sentence: She was reading a book while waiting for the train.
meaning list.sentence translation: रेलको पर्खाइमा उ एउटा किताब पढिरहेको थियो ।

meaning list.sentence: While I like the idea, it may not be practical.
meaning list.sentence translation: यद्यपि मलाई यो विचार मनपर्छ, यो व्यावहारिक नहुन सक्छ।

meaning list.sentence: She spent the whole day at the park.
meaning list.sentence translation: दिनभरि पार्कमा बिताए ।

meaning list.sentence: Whose book is this on the table?
meaning list.sentence translation: यो टेबलमा कसको पुस्तक छ?

meaning list.sentence: The river is very wide at this point.
meaning list.sentence translation: यस बिन्दुमा नदी धेरै चौडा छ।

meaning list.sentence: The news received wide attention in the media.
meaning list.sentence translation: समाचारले व्यापक मिडियाको ध्यानाकर्षण गरायो।

meaning list.sentence: We saw wild animals during our safari.
meaning list.sentence translation: हामीले हाम्रो सफारीमा जंगली जनावरहरू देख्यौं।

meaning list.sentence: The crowd went wild after the winning goal.
meaning list.sentence translation: विजयी गोलपछि दर्शक पागल बनेका थिए ।

meaning list.sentence: The wind was strong enough to knock over the chairs.
meaning list.sentence translation: हावाले कुर्सीहरू ढकढकाउन पर्याप्त बलियो थियो।

meaning list.sentence: The winner of the competition was awarded a gold medal.
meaning list.sentence translation: प्रतियोगिताको विजेतालाई स्वर्ण पदक प्रदान गरिएको थियो ।

meaning list.sentence: I wish you a happy birthday.
meaning list.sentence translation: म तिमीलाई जन्मदिनको शुभकामना दिन्छु।

meaning list.sentence: Her wish was to travel the world.
meaning list.sentence translation: उनको चाहना संसार घुम्ने थियो ।

meaning list.sentence: The table is made of solid wood.
meaning list.sentence translation: टेबल ठोस काठले बनेको छ।

meaning list.sentence: They went for a walk in the woods.
meaning list.sentence translation: उनीहरु जंगलमा घुम्न गए ।

meaning list.sentence: The house had a beautiful wooden staircase.
meaning list.sentence translation: घरमा काठको सुन्दर सिँढी थियो।

meaning list.sentence: The working conditions in the factory were improved.
meaning list.sentence translation: कारखानामा काम गर्ने अवस्था सुधारिएको छ।

meaning list.sentence: The elevator is finally in working order.
meaning list.sentence translation: लिफ्ट अन्ततः सञ्चालनमा छ।

meaning list.sentence: She was worried about her son’s health.
meaning list.sentence translation: छोराको स्वास्थ्यप्रति चिन्तित थिए ।

meaning list.sentence: Don’t worry; everything will be fine.
meaning list.sentence translation: चिन्ता नगर्नुहोस्; सबै ठीक हुनेछ।

meaning list.sentence: The situation is getting worse day by day.
meaning list.sentence translation: अवस्था दिनप्रतिदिन बिग्रदै गएको छ ।

meaning list.sentence: That was the worst experience of my life.
meaning list.sentence translation: यो मेरो जीवनको सबैभन्दा खराब अनुभव थियो।

meaning list.sentence: Wow, that’s an incredible painting!
meaning list.sentence translation: वाह, यो एक अविश्वसनीय चित्रकारी हो!

meaning list.sentence: The package hasn’t arrived yet.
meaning list.sentence translation: प्याकेज अझै आएको छैन ।

meaning list.sentence: The weather is cold, yet he went swimming.
meaning list.sentence translation: जाडो थियो, तर पनि उनी पौडी खेल्न गए।

meaning list.sentence: This book is yours, not mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: यो किताब तिम्रो हो, मेरो होइन।

meaning list.sentence: The temperature dropped to zero last night.
meaning list.sentence translation: हिजो राति तापक्रम शून्यमा झरेको थियो ।
